about.text: Hello, I'm Guilherme Farias, {yearsOld} years old, and I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development from Impacta College. I'm passionate about technology and its capacity for innovation. I have over 5 years of experience in web development.
about.text2: Currently, I've been studying ThreeJs to incorporate 3D elements into the web and enhance the user experience while navigating the site. Additionally, I'm also learning native mobile development.
about.text3: Besides programming, I love creating, whether it's RPG adventures, drawings, or those drawings in code with CSS. I also enjoy going for bike rides and skateboarding.

service.title: Services/skills
service.text: I possess solid skills in HTML, CSS (Scss, Bootstrap, Tailwind), JS ES6 (Jquery, React, Svelte), PHP (Wordpress), as well as advanced knowledge in UI/UX, SEO rules, analytics, and WCAG (accessibility).

contact.title: Contact
contact.subTitle: Send an Email
contact.text: If you have a company or business and are looking to develop a website or application to leverage it, a job proposal, or even suggestions or criticism, please contact me through this form. I would be happy to respond!

void.text: I developed the layout and code for the website, a digital marketing agency where I showcase the services and projects that I have developed as a freelancer.

cord.text: For those looking to rent trucks and machinery for their construction projects, Gui Rentals offers excellent prices with various models and options. - The first project testing Svelte.

bg.text: I created the visual identity of BG Softhouse, a marketing agency. With it, I was able to design the layout and develop the website, creating a promotional channel for the agency.
